description: number of tax returns for tax years 2012-2015

estimated number of audits for tax years 2012-2015. calculated by Kim Bloomquist using audit coverage rates published in the annual IRS Data Book in combination with county tax return data on the IRS website.
estimated number of audits per 1,000 returns (tax years 2012-2015)
for visualization. estimated number of audits per 1,000 returns (tax years 2012-2015). values below 6 are set to 6. Values above 11 are set to 11.
